mutants.code:
def calculate_total_chocolates(N, C, M):
    bought = N / C
    available = bought
    while available >= M:
        reimb = available // M
        bought += reimb
        ext = available % M
        available = reimb + ext
    return bought

def calculate_total_chocolates(N, C, M):
    bought = N * C
    available = bought
    while available >= M:
        reimb = available // M
        bought += reimb
        ext = available % M
        available = reimb + ext
    return bought
